bwwExcerpt: The reason to see the show is the very talented cast featuring the rockstar vocals of Adam Pascal (as Edward). Any musical theatre lover will instantly recognize his singular vocal stylings that garnered him a Tony nomination for his iconic role of Roger in the Tony Award winning phenomenon, "Rent". Pascal has always possessed that inexplicable "it" factor that mesmerizes and it's no different here. The Bryan Adams and Jim Vallance score is perfectly suited to his voice and he elevates every son
